about_the_game:
This collection of maps custom built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop contains dozens of incredible maps for use in your campaign.

This three part collection contains all cartography released by from 2011-2015, the maps are usable in any game system.

AAW Map Pack (Volume #2) contains 59 maps of various types and sizes.

Inside you will find:

  • Maps of various residential buildings from huntsman cabins to manors.
  • Four theatre maps and one cicrus map.
  • Maps of different caverns.
  • Three Otherworld maps.
  • Four overland maps.
  • Maps of shrines and tombs.
  • City encounters maps.
  • Five wilderness encounters maps.
  • Linked miniatures for all map types.

Works with all rulesets.
